title: Africa: Fairer Global Tax Won't Be Enough to Cure Africa's Chronic Capital Deficit
description: [ISS] The UN has decided an intergovernmental authority should set international tax rules and curb illicit financial flows.

title: Africa: Judge Dikgang Moseneke to Help Preside Over South Africa's Contentious Genocide Case Against Israel At ICJ
description: [Daily Maverick] The former deputy chief justice will be an ad-hoc judge only on this case.

title: Africa: CAF Increases 2023 Afcon Prize Money By 40 Percent
description: [New Times] The Confederation of African Football (CAF) has announced a 40 percent increase in prize money for teams that will reach the quarterfinals through the grand finale in the upcoming 2023 AFCON.

title: Africa: AU Appeals for Calm in Ethiopia-Somalia Row
description: [Vanguard] The African Union on Thursday joined the United States in appealing for calm in the Horn of Africa after regional tensions soared following a contested deal between Ethiopia and the breakaway region of Somaliland.

title: Africa: Africa's Growth Rate to Increase - UN World Economic Situation and Prospects Report 2024
description: [UN News] The UN's World Economic Situation and Prospects report for 2024 projects a slowdown in global growth from an estimated 2.7 per cent in 2023 to 2.4 per cent in 2024.

title: Africa: Horn of Africa - a Conflict Evolving Around Berbera Port
description: [DW] A new deal granting landlocked Ethiopia access to a seaport holds potential for a huge upheaval in the Horn of Africa. The breakaway region of Somaliland finds itself in a make-or-break situation.

title: Africa: AU Calls for Calm to De-Escalate Simmering Tension Between Ethiopia and Somalia
description: [New Times] The Chairperson of the African Union Commission, Amb. Moussa Faki Mahamat, has called for calm and mutual respect to de-escalate the simmering tension between the governments of Ethiopia and Somalia, following the signing of a port access deal between the former and Somaliland.

title: Africa: 2024 - a Year of Cautious Hope for African Economies Facing Worldwide Challenges
description: [Africa Renewal] The continent's economic growth is expected to inch up to 3.5 per cent
